Text:
You do this for fun? Well, i say f..k your fun in the ass! This episode you presented has missing 30+ seconds! And when you say, "Don't download it if you don't like it!", i'll say, "The damage is already done before i know some stupid encoder group named 'AMiGOS' don't know how to rip a tv show. Because i already downloaded before i knew it had missing the final seconds of the show.' 

You don't have to do this, you don't have to present a tv show here, when you obviously don't know how to do so! 

Don't download it, grab the CTU version. I hate morons who feel the need to make stupid attempts like this.
